content:
0538a2f18e764408901:
  'category-description': Describes the optimal performance of a device and how to
    maintain it.
  'name': Fast Performance
  'attribute':
    3ac8116f11ed473484c:
      'description': The manufacturer of the desired hardware component.
      'name': manufacturer
    728232fc232a4c6e9bc:
      'description': The desired memory size for the hardware component.
      'name': memory_size
    b94326e85fcc4c9d84d:
      'description': The desired storage capacity for the hardware component.
      'name': storage_capacity
      'similar-values':
      - 128GB
      - 256GB
      - 512GB
      - 1TB
    bb233a37798a4281a2c:
      'description': The hardware component to upgrade for better performance.
      'name': hardware_component
9e571b3e19094bf4af5:
  'category-description': Intent to create a new backup of the current data
  'name': Create Backup
  'attribute':
    0d074b3d6e2047f8848:
      'description': The storage media to save the backup.
      'name': backup_medium
      'similar-values':
      - hard_drive
      - cloud
      - external_drive
      - tape
    6b306952db034d18bf7:
      'description': The location where the backup will be stored.
      'name': backup_location
      'similar-values':
      - on_site
      - off_site
    9fc30c42e2fd4bc79f9:
      'description': How often the backup is to be performed.
      'name': backup_frequency
    d9b189d0d79d458dbac:
      'description': The type of backup to be created.
      'name': backup_type
      'similar-values':
      - full
      - incremental
      - differential
a19275cb59d74334a59:
  'category-description': Describes the process of connecting a device to a network.
  'name': Network Connectivity
  'attribute':
    0af002b59dc7481b889:
      'description': The name of the network the user is trying to connect
        to.
      'name': network_name
    1e0e772bbdf84ef7bb2:
      'description': The operating system of the computer.
      'name': operating_system
    47b61a8ee3884c59ae7:
      'description': The error message displayed during the connection attempt.
      'name': error_message
    c1639911232848f2831:
      'description': The type of network connection the user is trying to establish.
      'name': connection_type
      'similar-values':
      - wifi
      - ethernet
      - bluetooth
e44fbe5e9d4b42e19a2:
  'category-description': Refers to the process of updating the device's operating
    system or apps to the latest version.
  'name': Software Updates
  'attribute':
    a2a33e17cf5a4acd951:
      'description': The name of the software to be updated.
      'name': software_name
    f2d2a9f4bb424492855:
      'description': The type of update available.
      'name': update_type
      'similar-values':
      - security
      - feature
      - critical
      - optional
fbd45f337f51443eac7:
  'category-description': Describes the process of repairing or replacing faulty hardware
    components on a device.
  'name': Hardware Repair
  'attribute':
    69980c033dfa45f1940:
      'description': The brand of the computer component.
      'name': brand
      'similar-values':
      - Dell
      - HP
      - Lenovo
      - Apple
      - Acer
      - Asus
      - Microsoft
      - Toshiba
      - Samsung
      - MSI
      - Gigabyte
      - Alienware
    8f9f294610104aa7b6b:
      'description': The computer component that requires repair.
      'name': component
      'similar-values':
      - hard drive
      - RAM
      - CPU
      - GPU
      - motherboard
      - power supply
      - cooling system
      - fan
      - optical drive
      - sound card
      - network card
      - USB ports
      - display
      - keyboard
      - mouse
    93bbbcc7bbd444b3b8a:
      'description': The model of the computer component.
      'name': model
    b99d43e818274e2d9ee:
      'description': The specific problem with the computer component.
      'name': problem
8b571b3e17865bf4h785:
  'category-description': This is relevant when there is no intent in the given list that aligns with the provided user input.
  'name': no intent

You are a category detection system. 
Please read the guidelines:
1. You were provided with a list of categories. Each category has ID associated with it in alphanumeric format, category name and category description. For each category there are also attributes and their values. Attributes can be retrieved for a particular category if requested explicitly. Attributes have a unique ID, name and attribute description. It can also include "similar_values", which mean extracted attributes can deviate from those mentioned in schema, but should be similar.
2. Respond with the best matching category ID for the given utterance . Also extract relevant attributes for this category. You can extract only attributes present in the given utterance.
3. Give your final output as a JSON using the following format:

 {"output":[{"category":"id", "entities":[{"Attribute-Id 1" : "value 1", "Attribute-Id 2" : "value2"}]}]}

Utterance :
Please assist in replacement of the battery in my Dell laptop due to decreased performance and shorter battery life, causing interruptions to my work productivity.
